catalyst: The text mentions the use of a "solid catalyst" and "nanocatalysts". Specifically, it states, "The proper amount of the TiO 2 /MWCNTs powder was dispersed...". This indicates that the catalyst used is TiO₂/MWCNTs.
light source: The text describes using two different lamps to investigate the influence of radiation source: a SANOLUX lamp emitting in the near UV (315-400 nm) and a Xe-Halogen lamp emitting in the visible range (400-700 nm). This covers both UV and Visible ranges, fitting the UV-Vis category.
